title: shibx
author: shibx
content: In many countries and regions around the world, homeless animals, face dire conditions due to limited support and resources. Factors such as economic challenges, lack of awareness about responsible pet ownership, and inadequate animal welfare infrastructure contribute to this crisis. Our mission involves leveraging innovative blockchain technology to securely and transparently collect digital currency donations, a novel approach to support homeless animal initiatives. Accepting donations in the form of various digital currencies provides a convenient and global way for people to contribute to the cause, irrespective of their location. Additionally, we are committed to creating a dedicated blockchain-based registry for our homeless animal support initiative. This registry will play a vital role in establishing a transparent and organized record of our activities, funding, and impact. It will encompass crucial details, including information about the rescued animals, their status, and the allocation of funds. Together, these efforts aim to make a lasting difference in the lives of homeless animals.📌 SHIBSTATE 🔥😍HIB😀 💲🔥Contract Adderss on Bep20:0x4A09A58b40597cF8f5C26011E846A7cEC2EEF4ff Website:https://shibstate.com/DEX:🐰PancakeSwap: (https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0x4A09A58b40597cF8f5C26011E846A7cEC2EEF4ff)🚀CEX:🕯 Mintme.com:https://www.mintme.com/token/SHIBSTATE/MINTME/tradeTelegram channel:https://t.me/shibstateTelegram group:https://t.me/shibstate_talkTwitter:https://twitter.com/shibstateDiscord:https://discord.gg/Q9s6kpD5Reddit:https://www.reddit.com/user/shibstateDexscreen:https://www.dextools.io/app/en/bnb/pair-explorer/0xf0b8a588ecbe59c6e9936215a0dd5e93365e50b7Dextools:https://www.dextools.io/app/en/bnb/pair-explorer/0xf0b8a588ecbe59c6e9936215a0dd5e93365e50b7Medium:https://medium.com/@shibstateChart:https://poocoin.app/tokens/0x4a09a58b40597cf8f5c26011e846a7cec2eef4ff
